ygData.subject: Re: Lab 5 (Malice/Kitkat)
ygData.msgSnippet: Wolfblade:: She smiled and lifted the glass. Hmm, strong enough to take the hull off a stasis pod huh? Doubtfull it will even raise the fur on my tail.  She

Wolfblade::

She smiled and lifted the glass. "Hmm, strong enough to take the hull 
off a stasis pod huh? Doubtfull it will even raise the fur on my 
tail."  She downed the drink in one gulp. She looked at Malice with a 
smirk, "well, that was tastey and rather....Hurg!"  She dropped the 
glass on the floor and it shattered on the floor. Her optics flashed 
and stayed on a very bright solid color.  She sat stright up and 
started shake in her chair. More like vibrate in the chair. She 
studdered out, "W....w...wh...what.....i...in....in 
the....the...pit...pit?"  She transformed into wolf mode and back to 
bot mode and didn't even disturb the chair she was sitting in.  The 
rush stoppped as abruptly as it started. Her optics went back to 
normal and she sat looking at Malice. Her tone of voice was calm and 
relaxed. "Hmm, not bad. But kind of lacking in, oh I don't know, 
spunk. Got anything else up your sleeve?"




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "bustercross365" <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice got up and slid behind the counter.  He pulled out several 
> bottles of assorted liqures and an energon tap.
> "If we were in civilization, people wound refer to me as the 
> Cybertronian Devil, or The Archfiend of Death.  My reputation is 
one 
> that the Maximal Council and the current Emperor of Destruction do 
> not look highly upon.  I do not have an easy life among these 
> Maximals or Predacons."
> As he talked, he mixed several liqures together in a sequence and 
> then added refined energon.  He stirred it and served a little to 
> Wolfblade.
> "Stronge enough to take the hull plating of a stasis pod."
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "shadowess_azogoth" 
> <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> > Wolfblade::
> > She looked at Malice. "Other places huh? Well, if you want to 
talk, 
> > I'm here. Now, what drinks do you think you can whip up that a.. 
> what 
> > did you call it, Devcon won't touch? Eh, sounds like spring water 
> to 
> > me. Your probably just pulling my tail." she said with a wink. 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > Malice nodded and turned to Nightlight for a moment.
> > > "Tell Camoflage I'm sorry if I hurt her feelings."
> > > He then turned and followed Wolfblade into the mess hall.
> > > "Out drink me, huh?  I've mixed some wacky drinks that even 
> Devcon 
> > wouldn't touch."
> > > He pulled up a chair and sat dowm with a sigh.
> > > "It's nice here.  People call me by name here.  Not like 
anywhere 
> > else."
> > > 
> > > shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> > > WOlfblade::
> > > 
> > > She glanced and walked back, three or four steps back to the 
lab. 
> > She 
> > > saw Elita and Nightlight. She lowered her optics and shook her 
> > head. 
> > > "Good grief." She looked at Malice. "Yo, You up for a mug of 
hot 
> > > energon or what? Bet I can out drink you in EnerGIN anytime. 
That 
> > is 
> > > some stuff that will make your systems think it entered the 
> middle 
> > of 
> > > a phasic meltdown. heh heh heh."
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley 
<bustercross365@y...> 
> > > wrote:
> > > > Malice turned to see Nightlight standing with Elita.
> > > > "I think he went and followed Camoflage to her quarters I 
> think.  
> > > Come to think of it, I need to apologize to Camo anyway." 
> > > > He stood up straight, turned to face the one he addressed, 
and 
> > > leaned against one elbow on the sphere.
> > > > 
> > > > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > > Nighlight/elita::
> > > > 
> > > > nighlight arrives with elita, the litle child was calming 
down 
> > and 
> > > > now was sleeping. When she saw Malice and Kitkat she 
said "Hi!! 
> > > Have 
> > > > you seen Kup???? "
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley 
> <bustercross365@y...> 
> > > > wrote:
> > > > > Malice heard her and rolled the heavy thing into the lab.  
It 
> > was 
> > > > almost as tall as she was.
> > > > > "One basalt sphere, ready for final manufacture, after I 
take 
> a 
> > > > nap and have a meal of energon." 
> > > > > He said the latter part sarcastically, for he was quite 
> tired.  
> > > He 
> > > > was leaning against his handwork, trying to keep his optics 
> open 
> > > and 
> > > > his knees unlocked.
> > > > > 
> > > > > shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> > > > > Wolfblade::
> > > > > 
> > > > > She had gone to the lab and worked on the magnet as soon as 
> > > Malice 
> > > > > had left the base. She was putting the finishing touches on 
> it 
> > as 
> > > > she 
> > > > > heard her name being called out. "I'm here in Lab number 5."
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley 
> > <bustercross365@y...> 
> > > > > wrote:
> > > > > > Malice nodded and transformed into his beast mode.  He 
> > wanders 
> > > > > outside of the base, searching for lava tubes or 
something.  
> > > After 
> > > > > about a megacycle of wandering and searching, he finally 
> found 
> > a 
> > > > > basalt based lava flow and transformed.  He wadded about 
knee 
> > > deep 
> > > > > and absorbed the heat so he would not melt or warp his 
legs.  
> > He 
> > > > got 
> > > > > a hand full of the heavy thick stuff, and drew the heat 
out, 
> > > > leaving 
> > > > > a solid mass.  He then dipped it into the lava, pulled it 
> out, 
> > > and 
> > > > > repeated the process until it was halfway up his chest 
after 
> > > > several 
> > > > > megacycles.  He rolled it out of the lava stream and began 
to 
> > > roll 
> > > > it 
> > > > > back to the base.
> > > > > >  
> > > > > >  
> > > > > > Two megacycles later, Malice finally rolled the crude 
> sphere 
> > > > like 
> > > > > ball into the base.  He rolled it into the cargo bay, and 
> went 
> > to 
> > > > > find Wolfblade.
> > > > > > "Hey Wolfblade, I finished the sphere!  Where are you?"  
> > > > > >
